items.title: Suboptimal dialysis initiation common in patients with advanced CKD
items.description: Suboptimal dialysis initiation, typically defined as dialysis initiation during a hospitalization and/or with a central venous catheter, is common amo...

items.title: Ritz update: FDA issues risk warning due to undeclared peanuts in some cracker sandwiches
items.description: Ritz peanut butter cracker sandwiches are being recalled due to the possible presence of undeclared peanuts, a major allergen.

items.title: Keurig K-Cups recalled due to potential ink contamination
items.description: Keurig K-Cups are being recalled nationwide due to a packaging issue that could cause ink to run into the coffee during brewing.

items.title: Kinshasa slum battles deadly cholera outbreak
items.description: Faced with a lack of running water, unsanitary conditions and poverty, the Kinshasa neighborhood of Pakadjuma has struggled to end a cholera epidemic ...

items.title: Southern China hit by outbreak of mosquito-borne infection chikungunya
items.description: China is experiencing an outbreak of chikungunya, a mosquito-borne infection, with thousands of cases reported in the south.
